title: enda samarttaik-kaNDu mayanginALO
sahitya:
enda samatrraik-kaNDu mayanginALO inamalar tAngum guNamuDaiyALO


anupallavi

  natti malar tenai uNDa maru kaNam nAnArO nIyArO enru OdiDum vaNDE 
vittaga mAmAyan tanakkum unakkum malar virumbum tiru maghaTkum uravenbadonrE
vENapaDi paNIndadAghilum uLaduviDAn koDAn uDan paDAn
dAra daivan guNamAghilum tirumaghaL Anavan aDimaiyadAnavan kaNNaniDam


caraNam    ayyam viTTa mAbaliyinait-turatti Azha rasAdalam vaittadu kaNDO 
AshaiyuDan vanda nEsattinaip-pOlE angam pazhudu paDa Akkinadaik-kaNDO
sheyyum kAraNam onrumillAmal tEDi mrgam onrai shADinadaik-kaNDO 
shIrATTi pAlUTTa vanda oru peNNai shirittu mOkSamum tandadu kaNDO
